genresAdvancedInfo.name: kalmar indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: "Kalmar Indie" is a subgenre of indie rock that originated in the city of Kalmar, Sweden. It is known for its melodic guitar riffs, introspective lyrics, and DIY ethos. The sound is often described as dreamy and atmospheric, with influences from shoegaze, post-punk, and alternative rock.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
